item.title: Create Docker image with Packer, PowerShell, PowerCLI and Azure DevOps self-hosted agent
item.author: Daniel Hanaj
item.description: Today we will create a Docker image that will contain Packer, Windows Update Provisioner for Packer, PowerShell, PowerCLI and Azure DevOps self-hosted agent.
